00015 $Id: SARequest.php 5 2006-06-18 13:25:30Z trinculescu $
00016 */
00017 
00022 final class SARequest {
00023         private static $app;
00024 
00030         public static function setApplicationObject(SApplication &$app) {
00031                 self::$app = &$app;
00032         }
00033         
00038         public static function init() {
00039                 self::$app->setServerName($_SERVER['SERVER_NAME']);
00040                 self::$app->setServerPort($_SERVER['SERVER_PORT']);
00041                 self::$app->setServerSecure($_SERVER["HTTPS"] == 'on');
00042                 self::$app->setPathInfo($_SERVER['PATH_INFO']);
00043                 $scriptName = basename($_SERVER['SCRIPT_FILENAME']);
00044                 self::$app->setScriptName($scriptName);
00045                 ereg("^(.*)$scriptName", $_SERVER['REDIRECT_URL'], $matches);
00046                 self::$app->setScriptPath($matches[1]); 
00047         }
00048         
00054         public static function checkValidity() {                
00055                 ereg($_GET[self::$app->getGPPageName()] . "(.*)", self::$app->getPathInfo(), $matches);
00056                 if ($matches[1]) {
00057                         $uri = $_SERVER['REQUEST_URI'];
00058                         ereg(self::$app->getScriptPath() . "(.*)/chk", $uri, $matches);
00059                         if (md5(SA_SECRET_KEY . $matches[1]) != $_REQUEST['chk']) {
00060                                 throw new URLManipulationException('the client altered the request parameters');
00061                         }
00062                 }
00063         }
00064         
00069         public static function detectPageName() {
00070                 $pathInfo = explode('/', self::$app->getPathInfo());
00071                 $length = count($pathInfo);
00072                 $pageName = ($length == 1) ? self::$app->getDefaultPageName() : null;
00073                 if ($length > 1) {
00074                         for($i = $length; $i > 0; $i--) {
00075                                 $page = implode('/', array_slice($pathInfo, 1, $i));
00076                                 if (is_null($pathInfo[$i])) $page .= '/' . self::$app->getDefaultPageName();
00077                                 $pageFileName = self::$app->getPageSearchDirectory() . "/$page.php";
00078                                 if (is_file($pageFileName)) {
00079                                         $pageName = $page;
00080                                         break;
00081                                 }
00082                         }
00083                 }
00084                 $_REQUEST[self::$app->getGPPageName()] = $_GET[self::$app->getGPPageName()] = $pageName;                
00085         }
00086         
00091         public static function detectGETParameters() {          
00092                 ereg($_GET[self::$app->getGPPageName()] . "(.*)", self::$app->getPathInfo(), $matches);
00093                 $params = explode('/', $matches[1]);
00094                 $length = count($params);
00095                 for($i = 1; $i < $length - 1; $i += 2) {
00096                         $_REQUEST[$params[$i]] = $_GET[$params[$i]] = self::decodeParam($params[$i + 1]);
00097                 }
00098         }
00099         
00105         public static function decodeParam($value) {
00106                 $decoded = urldecode($value);
00107                 if (ereg('^NjQ=NjQ=NjQ=([A-Za-z0-9=]+)$', $decoded, $matches)) {
00108                         $decoded = base64_decode($matches[1]);
00109                 }
00110                 return $decoded;
00111         }
00112 }
